name: Penguin Cafe
overview: Small PENGUIN has just lost his work and found a new job at the MSXcafé. He must serve beer (without alcohol) to regular customers. But these clients are famous video-game actors who need to go off quickly in order that players find them in the next stage. They go away if Small PENGUIN is not enough rapid. Besides, the owner supervises closely and if too many beers are lost, then he will dismiss Small PENGUIN.
